experience.name: Amazing Kit-Chen
experience.title: Israeli authentic meal and experience
experience.desc: A casual, multi-course, gourmet Israeli- Mediterranean dinner prepared by a chef who trained in Michelin-starred restaurants in Italy and cooked in some of the best restaurants in Tel Aviv.

appetizer.title: Jerusalem pretzel
appetizer.desc: Jerusalem style pretzel with sesame and Za’atar

mainCourse.title: Kubenia
mainCourse.desc: hand chopped tenderloin with bulgur, smoked onion and almonds

desserts.title: Basbusa
desserts.desc: semolina cake with goat cheese cream, walnuts honey and cinnamon

experience.name: Italian Nights
experience.title: Summer Nights Tasting Menu
experience.desc:
A culinary gem is hidden near the Basel complex. Join Tomer, a chef, in his chic apartment in the center of Tel Aviv for a meal with flavors that will take you one evening to an unforgettable visit to Sicily.      What to expect:
      • A meticulous 8-course Sicilian chef's meal
      • Israeli and international wines are served throughout the meal without restriction
      • Chef with a rich background in restaurants in Israel and around the world
      • Designed apartment, near the Basel complex in Tel Aviv

appetizer.title: Home-made breads
appetizer.desc: Home-made breads from a traditional brick oven

appetizer.title: Bobs beans, with tomatoes, basil, shallots and garlic confit
appetizer.desc: Lima beans, garlic confit, shallots, semi dried tomatoes, basil and tahini sauce

appetizer.title: Young beets in the oven, hazelnut oil, "yogurt stone" and arugula
appetizer.desc: Smoked eggplant, thyme cream, and sheep yogurt

mainCourse.title: Grilled young kohlrabi, cachuta cheese, sunflower and thyme vinaigrette
mainCourse.desc: Chopped beef tenderloin, spices from Palermo, Turkish spinach, barley and walnuts

mainCourse.title: Long-cooked beef shoulder, spinach risotto, beef axis and spicy crust
mainCourse.desc: Slow roasted beef chuck, risotto with butter and white wine served with "green" sauce

desserts.title: Goat cheese cream, Sicilian cookie and golden pear
desserts.desc: Goat cheese cream, Chebakia cookie, honey, fresh pears and cinnamon

experience.name: Come Eat Lionesses
experience.title: Innovative Sustainable Tasting Menu in Hackney
experience.desc:
Michelin-trained Chef Aidan Brooks, creator of Eleven98 invites you to experience his Chef's Table concept: an innovative and sustainable fine dining tasting menu in the open-plan dining space of his Shoreditch home.

      What to expect :
      
      • An innovative, sustainable 7-course tasting menu
      • Welcome drink on arrival
      • Guests are welcome to BYOB
      • In the heart of Hackney, East London's most sought-after borough
      • 10 guests around one communal table
      • Host offers both private and open events
      • Former Head Chef at the critically acclaimed Vanilla Black

location.address: 10 Downing St, Westminster, London SW1A 2AA, United Kingdom

desserts.title: CHOCOLATE OR VEGAN TRUFFLES
desserts.desc: Dark Chocolate Ganache, Porcini + White Truffle Oil

experience.name: Come BBQ in the oval office
experience.title: presidential meal
experience.desc:
Calling all meat lovers! Experience a delightful authentic Uruguayan barbecue in the heart of Brooklyn made with organic, market-fresh ingredients sourced locally and imported Uruguayan beef.

      • Classic Uruguayan barbecue slowly cooked over firewood embers
      • Yerba mate crafted cocktails, guests can also BYOB
      • Communal dining for 4 to 20 people
      • Casual atmosphere: 'mi casa es tu casa' - make yourself at home!

location.address: 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue NW, Washington, DC 20500, United States

appetizer.title: Welcome Yerba Mate Cocktail
appetizer.desc: yerba mate is a typical South American tea infused with vodka and fresh herbs

appetizer.title: Grill Chorizo Bruschetta
appetizer.desc: homemade Argentian sausage and blood sausage made locally in Queens served with homemade sourdough bread

mainCourse.title: Parrillada
mainCourse.desc: grill organic uruguayan ribeye + skirt steak served with chimichurri sauce

desserts.title: Smoked Pineapple & Masscarpone
desserts.desc: Pineapple on the grill & Masscarpone cheese

drinks.title: Drinks & Beverages
drinks.desc: Cocktail, Guests can bring alcohol, Tea, Water, Yerba

user.desc: Chen has been hosting in her kitchen ever since EatSo was launched. She fell in love with the concept of inviting people who are passioante about food and claims that there's nothing more fulfilling than cooking for people who share the same love with her
Haim has been known for his authentic oriental cuisine for years. He's an awarded top-chef in Israel and began his journey with EatSo 4 years ago
The passion of Michal for food began long time ago when she used to watch her grandmother cooking. Ever since she's been cooking herself and invite you all to an unforgattable evening in her kitchen
